Reviews.Title: Love this Camera
Reviews.Author: Joseph T. Susca
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from a D7000 to this D7100 and the difference in the auto focusing is exceptional.  the quality of the images are much improved too with the increased Megapixels.  I highly recommend it.
